name: The Battle Front
description:
The Battle Front is a player vs player tactics game that tests your strategy and planning ability. In this demo, you will get your feet wet and learn the basics of how to play.

Rules:

- Use the mouse to select action buttons, recruit types desired, and confirming actions.

- A maximum of 5 soldiers per player is allowed at any time

- Each soldier type has an attack power vs. slow movement balance. Chose your allies wisely and use their strengths to your advantage!

- All decisions are based on a dice roll.

- The object of the game is simple, destroy the enemy base!

- To exit out of full screen, press Alt + Enter

Check back frequently for updates and improvements that will be released as they come out. Please feel free to give me any feedback!
